类 RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>

java.lang.Object
RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T>
类型参数:
T - the base type for which subtypes will be registered
所有已实现的接口:
com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
public class RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<T> extends Object implements com.google.gson.TypeAdapterFactory
A custom TypeAdapterFactory for Gson that enables polymorphic (de)serialization by embedding a type label field into the JSON representation.

This factory allows you to serialize and deserialize an abstract class or interface by registering known subtypes along with a unique label for each. When serializing, the label is included in the JSON under a configurable key (e.g., "type"). When deserializing, the label is used to instantiate the correct subtype.

This is especially useful for saving collections or references to abstract types, such as InventoryItem, where the concrete subtype (e.g., FoodItem or GiftItem) must be preserved in the save file.

Example usage:


 RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory<InventoryItem> itemFactory = RuntimeTypeAdapterFactory
     .of(InventoryItem.class, "type")
     .registerSubtype(FoodItem.class, "FoodItem")
     .registerSubtype(GiftItem.class, "GiftItem");

 Gson gson = new GsonBuilder()
     .registerTypeAdapterFactory(itemFactory)
     .create();
作者:
Yu Li
